source: Hello, how are you?
target: Namaste, tapaai kasto cha?

source: What is your name?
target: Tapaiko naam ke ho?

source: I am fine, thank you.
target: Ma sanchai chu, dhanyabaad.

source: Where are you going?
target: Tapaai kaha janu hunchha?

source: Can you help me?
target: Ke tapaai malai madad garna saknuhunchha?

source: What time is it?
target: Kati bajyo?

source: I need some water.
target: Malai kehi paani chahincha.

source: Please wait here.
target: Kripaya yaha parkhanuhos.

source: How much does this cost?
target: Yo kati ko ho?

source: Good night!
target: Subha ratri!

source: I was wondering if you could tell me the best way to get to the airport from here.
target: Ma sochdai thiye ki tapaai malai yaha bata bimansthal samma jadai sabai bhanda ramro tarika bhanidinu hunchha ki?

source: The meeting was postponed to next Friday because the manager was not available today.
target: Baithak agami shukrabar samma sariyo kinabhane prabandhak aaja upalabdha hunu bhaena.

source: I really appreciate all the help you have given me in completing this project on time.
target: Ma sachikai dhanyabaadi chu jun madad tapaai le malai yo pariyojana samay ma pura garna diyeko cha.

source: Can you please recommend a good restaurant nearby that serves authentic Nepali cuisine?
target: Ke tapaai kripaya yaha najikai ek ramro restaurant sujhauna saknuhunchha jaha asli Nepali parikar paiyo?

source: The weather forecast says it’s going to rain heavily tomorrow, so don’t forget to take an umbrella with you.
target: Mausam sambad le bhanchha bholi dherai pani parnecha, tesaile chhata lagna birsinu hunchha ki.

source: If you need any assistance with the registration process, feel free to reach out to our support team.
target: Yadi tapaai lai panji karan prakriya ma kunai sahayog chahincha bhane, hamro sahayata samuh sanga sampark garnus.

source: I have always dreamed of visiting the mountains of Nepal and experiencing the breathtaking views.
target: Ma sadhai Nepal ko pahad haru ghumnu ra manakrama lageko drishya anubhav garnu ko sapana dekhdai aayeko thiye.

source: Learning a new language can be challenging, but it is also a very rewarding experience.
target: Naya bhasha siknu kathin huncha tara yo ek damai puraskrit anubhav pani ho.

source: We should finalize the budget proposal by the end of this week to meet the project deadlines.
target: Hami le yo hapta ko antim samma budget proposal lai antim rup dinu parcha pariyojana ko samaya sima purna garna.

source: The teacher explained the concept so clearly that everyone in the class understood it immediately.
target: Shikshak le yo abadharana itikhera spashta rup ma samjhaye ki kachha ma sabai le tatkalai bujhyo.

source: Before we finalize the design, let’s have a detailed discussion about the client’s requirements and expectations.
target: Hamile design antim garna aghi, grahak ko aabashyakta ra apeksha haru barema bistarit chalphal garna paro.

source: I had an amazing time exploring the cultural heritage sites and learning about their historical significance.
target: Ma sanskritik sampada sthal haru ghumnu ra tin ko aitihasik mahatwa ko barema siknu ma adbhut samay bitaye.

source: If you are planning to hike in the Himalayas, make sure to carry proper gear and check the weather conditions beforehand.
target: Yadi tapaai Himalaya ma hiking ko yojana banaundai hunuhuncha bhane, uchit saman lagna ra agadi nai mausam sthiti janchha.

source: The customer service representative was very polite and resolved my issue efficiently within a few minutes.
target: Grahaak seva pratinidhi ekdam namra thie ra tinle mero samasya kehi minutes bhitra chakchake sanga samadhan gare.

source: I am looking forward to attending the workshop on sustainable living practices next weekend.
target: Ma agami hapta ko antya ma sthayi jivan ko amal haru bareko karkashala ma jancha lai utsuk chau.

source: The doctor recommended taking a short walk every day to improve my overall health and well-being.
target: Doktar le mero sampurna swasthya ra kalyan sudharna prati din ek chin hiddul garna sujhab diyeko thiyo.

source: It’s important to double-check all the documents before submitting them to avoid any errors or omissions.
target: Kunai galti athwa chhutteko kura nabhirkaune ho bhane, sabai dastavej jamaa garna aghi dubara parikshan garnu jaruri huncha.

source: We decided to host the conference in a central location to make it convenient for all participants to attend.
target: Hami le sabai bhaagidar lai aasan parne gareko ek kendriya sthaan ma sammelan ayojana garne nirdharit garayo.

source: The book provides valuable insights into effective communication strategies in professional environments.
target: Pustak le byaabasaayik maahol ma prabhaabit sanchar yojana haru ma mulyaawan jankari dincha.

source: Can you please let me know if there are any updates regarding the event schedule or location?
target: Ke tapaai malai karyakram ko samayapan ra sthal samparka ma kunai update cha bhane bhanidinu saknuhunchha?

source: I had a hard time finding a reliable internet connection during my trip to the remote village.
target: Ma durgam gau ghumnu gaera bharparna sakne internet sambandh khojda dukhai bhayo.

source: The workshop covered topics such as time management, goal setting, and maintaining a healthy work-life balance.
target: Karkashala le samaya prabandhan, lakshya nirdharan, ra swastha kaam-jivan santulan ka bishay haru sameta sameteko thiyo.

source: Despite the heavy rain, the team managed to complete the task successfully within the given deadline.
target: Tivra varsha hunda pani, samuh le diyeko samaya seema bhitra kaam safal rupma pura garna sakyo.

source: I strongly believe that education is the key to unlocking countless opportunities in life.
target: Ma dhridh vishwas gardachhu ki shiksha jivan ma anek avasar kholne kunji ho.

source: The presentation highlighted the importance of adopting renewable energy sources to combat climate change.
target: Prastuti le jalvayu parivartan sanga ladna punyabhaavi urja srot apnaune aabashyakta ma jor diyeko thiyo.

source: Please ensure that all safety protocols are strictly followed during the construction process.
target: Kripaya nirmaan prakriya ma sabai suraksha niyam haru kadhakadhar paalan hune sunishchit garnus.

source: The village community came together to build a new school for the children after the old one was destroyed by the earthquake.
target: Bhukampa le purano school bigre pachi gau samudaaya milera naya school nirman gare.

source: The documentary provided a fascinating glimpse into the daily lives of people living in remote Himalayan regions.
target: Dokyumentri le Himalaya ko durgam chetra ma basne manis haru ko dainik jivan ma romanchak jhalak diyeko thiyo.

source: I had the opportunity to attend a live performance of traditional Nepali music and dance last weekend.
target: Maile gaeko hapta ko antima paramparik Nepali sangit ra nritya ko pratyaksh pradarshan herne mauka paye.

source: The school organized a field trip to the national park to teach students about wildlife conservation.
target: School le bidyarthi haru lai jangali jivan sanrakshan bare shikhaune lagi rashtriya udhyan ko field trip ayojana gareko thiyo.

source: The government has introduced a new policy to support small businesses and promote entrepreneurship in rural areas.
target: Sarkar le sanu byaapar haru lai samarthan ra gramin chetra ma udyamshilata badhauna naya niti prastut gareko cha.

source: During the festival, the streets were beautifully decorated with colorful lights and traditional patterns.
target: Parva ko samaya ma galli haru rangichangi batti ra paramparik aakriti haru le sundar sanga sajaye ko thiyo.

source: The researcher presented the findings of her study on climate change and its impact on agriculture.
target: Anusandhak le jalvayu parivartan ra yas ko krishi ma parne prabhav bareko anusandhan ko natija prastut gare.

source: Please make sure to review all the terms and conditions carefully before signing the contract.
target: Kripaya samjhauta ma hastakshar garnu agadi sabai sharta ra niyam haru ramrari hernus.

source: The newly constructed bridge will significantly reduce travel time between the two cities.
target: Naya baneko pul le dui sahar bich ko yatra samay ko kramash: ghataune cha.

source: The teacher encouraged students to think critically and solve problems creatively during the group activity.
target: Shikshak le samuh gatibidhi ko kram ma bidyarthi haru lai samal kritishil sanga sochna ra rachnatmak tarikale samasya samadhan garna protsaahan dinu bhaeko thiyo.

source: After a long day of hiking, we rested by the lake and enjoyed the serene environment.
target: Lamo din ko hiking pachi, hami taal najikai aram gari ra shant vatavaran ko anand liyeu.

source: The company announced plans to expand its operations into international markets next year.
target: Company le agami barsa antarrashtriya bajar ma aphno karekram bistaar garne yojana ko ghoshana gareko cha.

source: I was deeply moved by the heartfelt stories shared during the charity event.
target: Ma daan karyakram ko samaya ma share gareko manaprabhavit katha haru le gehera prabhavit bhae.

source: The museum houses an extensive collection of artifacts that depict the rich history and culture of the region.
target: Sangrahalay ma chhetra ko samriddha itihas ra sanskriti darsaunde vastukala ko ek bistrit sangraha cha.

source: To ensure a successful event, the organizers paid attention to every small detail, from decorations to food arrangements.
target: Karyakram safal banaunde lagi, ayojak haru le sajawat dekhi khana milao sama sabai sanu kura haru ma dhyan diye.

source: The farmer explained how innovative techniques have improved crop yields and reduced costs over the past few years.
target: Kisan le kasari navachar tarika haru le pachhi ka kehi barsa ma bali utpadan sudhareko ra lagat ghataune bhanera samjhauna bhaeko thiyo.

source: The tour guide shared interesting legends and historical facts about the ancient temple we visited.
target: Yatra margdarshak le hami gayeko prachin mandir bareka rochak katha ra aitihasik tathya haru share garnu bhaeko thiyo.

source: The local community organized a clean-up drive to raise awareness about environmental conservation.
target: Sthaniya samudaaya le vatavaran sanrakshan bare chetana jagaaune lagi safai abhiyan ayojana gareko thiyo.

source: She spent several months conducting research on the traditional medicinal practices used in the region.
target: Unle kshetra ma prayog hune paramparik aushadhi prakriya ko barema kehi mahina anusandhan garna bitaye.

source: The new app offers a user-friendly interface and features that simplify online transactions.
target: Naya app le upayogkarta-anukool samuchhe ra online le naya feature haru cha.

source: During the seminar, experts discussed strategies to combat cybercrime and enhance digital security.
target: Seminar ko samaya ma visheshagya haru le cybercrime sanga ladne tarika ra digital suraksha sudharna bare chalphal gare.

source: The chef prepared a delicious five-course meal using fresh, locally sourced ingredients.
target: Rasoiyale taja sthaniya saman prayog garera mitho paanch roti meal tayar garnu bhaeko thiyo.

source: The recent advancements in technology have transformed the way we communicate and access information.
target: Pachhilo takniki pragati le hami sanchaar garne ra jankari prapta garne tarika ma parivartan lyayo.

source: They collaborated with international organizations to provide relief and rebuild infrastructure after the disaster.
target: Unharu le antarrashtriya sangathan haru sanga sahayog garera durghatana pachi rahat tatha purano dhacha punarnirman garne kaam gare.

source: The scientists conducted a groundbreaking study to understand the long-term effects of air pollution on human health.
target: Vaigyanik haru le havo pradushan le manav swasthya ma parne dirghakalik prabhav bujhna ek pathbreaking adhyan chalaye.

target: Hami ek sano durgam gau gayou jaha kehi pidhi dekhi basinda haru bina bijuli basdai aayeko cha.

target: Daan program le thikai dherai paisa uthaune, jasko use health ko kaam ma garna sakincha.

target: Yaha ka kisan haru productivity badhauna modern tarika apnai raheko cha, ani environment lai ni harm kam parcha.

source: The new highway has significantly improved connectivity between rural areas and major cities.
target: Naya highway le gramin thau ra thula sahar bich ko connection ekdam ramro banako cha.

source: The team is conducting surveys to understand the needs and challenges faced by the local population.
target: Team le yaha ka manche haru ko problems ra unko aabashyakta bujhna survey gariraheko cha.

source: The museum houses an extensive collection of artifacts that depict the rich history and culture of the region.
target: Museum ma ramailo prachin samaan haru cha, jun kshetra ko sanskriti ra itihas ko katha dekhaucha.

source: The teacher encouraged students to think critically and solve problems creatively during the group activity.
target: Teacher le bhanera biddharthi haru lai dhar dhar group ma sochera samasya ko hal garna ramailo banaye.

source: Despite the heavy rain, the team managed to complete the task successfully within the given deadline.
target: Dherai paani pare pani, team le task khattam deadline bhitra gareko cha ni.

source: The book provides valuable insights into effective communication strategies in professional environments.
target: Yo kitab le office ma kasari ramro communication garna milcha bhanera ramro kura haru sikhaucha.

source: The tour guide shared interesting legends and historical facts about the ancient temple we visited.
target: Tour guide le kasto ramailo katha ra history ko kura share gare mandir bare jaha gako thiyou.

source: The school organized a field trip to the national park to teach students about wildlife conservation.
target: School le students lai wildlife ko bare sikhaune bhanera national park ko trip organize gareko thiyo.

source: The children were excited to play in the park after school and enjoyed the swings and slides.
target: Bachha haru school pachhi park ma khelna jada ekdam excited thiye, jhula ra slide khelera ramailo garen.

source: The weather was perfect for a picnic, so we packed some food and headed to the riverside.
target: Mausam ekdam thik thiyo picnic ko lagi, tesaile khana pack gare ra nadi ko kinara tira gayaun.

source: The workshop was designed to help participants develop better time management skills.
target: Workshop ma manche haru lai time management kasari thik garna sikhaucha bhanera design gareko thiyo.

source: After a long day at work, I love to relax with a good book and a cup of tea.
target: Kaam ko lamo din pachi, ma ramro kitab ra ek cup chai sanga relax garna man parcha.

source: The local farmers market was full of fresh fruits, vegetables, and handmade goods.
target: Local bazaar ma dherai taja falful, tarkari, ra hathle banako samaan haru bharpoor thiyo.

source: The young artist painted a beautiful mural that depicted scenes from daily life in the village.
target: Yuva artist le gau ko dainik jindagi dekhaune ekdam ramailo painting banayo.

source: We spent the afternoon hiking up the hill and enjoying the breathtaking view from the top.
target: Hami beluka pahar chadera, mathi dekhi ko ramro view herda belka bitayeu.

source: The elderly man shared stories of his youth, and we listened with great interest.
target: Buda manche le afno jawani ko katha sunaye, ani hami ramailo sanga suniraheko thiyou.

source: The movie was so funny that we couldn't stop laughing throughout the entire show.
target: Film etti dami ramailo thiyo ki pura show hami hasaune sakena.

source: She loves cooking new recipes and often experiments with different flavors and ingredients.
target: Uslai naya recipe banuna ekdam man parcha, ani jhanjhan naya masala ra saman haru try garcha.

source: The students organized a fundraiser to support the local animal shelter.
target: Students haru le local janawar shelter ko lagi paisa uthaaune program organize gare.

source: The scenic train ride through the mountains was a memorable experience for everyone on board.
target: Mountain bhitra bata train ko ride ekdam dami memory thiyo sabai ko lagi.

source: The new mobile app makes it easy to track your daily expenses and manage your budget.
target: Naya mobile app le daily kharcha ra budget track garna ekdam sajilo banaucha.

source: The little girl carefully painted a picture of her family and proudly showed it to everyone.
target: Sano keti le afno family ko photo ramrari paint gari ani sabai lai dekhaudi thiyo.

source: We woke up early to watch the sunrise from the hilltop, and it was absolutely stunning.
target: Hami ghanta ma uthyo sunrise herna pahad mathi bata, ani ekdam ramailo thiyo.

source: The new coffee shop in town has become a popular spot for young people to hang out.
target: Sahar ko naya coffee shop aba yuva haru ko chill garne thau baneko cha.

source: The sports team trained hard every day and finally won the championship after years of effort.
target: Team le dherai mehnat gari din dinai ani aba barsa ko try pachi championship jityo.

source: The music festival featured talented artists from all over the country and attracted a huge crowd.
target: Music festival ma pura desh bata aaye janne artist haru le perform gare, ani dami bheed thiyo.

source: The tourists enjoyed exploring the local markets and tasting the delicious street food.
target: Tourist haru le local bazaar ma ghumera ani mitho street food khaera ramailo gare.

source: The library is a quiet place where people can study, read, or simply relax.
target: Library ek shanti thau ho, jaha manche padhna, kitab herna, ya just relax garna sakincha.

source: The family planned a weekend getaway to the mountains to enjoy some fresh air and quiet time.
target: Family le weekend ma pahar tira ghumna plan gare, fresh hawa ani shanti time ko lagi.

source: The little boy was thrilled to see the colorful balloons at the fair and wanted to buy them all.
target: Sano keta mela ma dekhiyeko rangichangi balloon herera ekdam khusi thiyo, sabai kinchu bhanthyo.

source: The chef prepared a special dish using locally sourced ingredients that everyone loved.
target: Chef le local saman le ekdam special dish banayo, jun sabai lai dami lagyo.

source: We decided to spend the afternoon at the beach, swimming and building sandcastles.
target: Hami beach ma swimming garna ra baalu ko ghar banuna beluka bitauchu bhanera decide gare.

source: The teacher explained the math problem in a simple way so that everyone could understand.
target: Teacher le math ko problem dherai simple tarikale bujhayo jasto sabai le bujhaun.

source: The cat jumped onto the windowsill to watch the birds outside.
target: Biralo jhyal ko silo ma chara haru herna jhampiyo.

source: During the long train journey, we played games and shared stories to pass the time.
target: Train ko lamo travel ma hami games khelera ra katha share garera time pass gare.

source: The farmer worked hard in the fields all day, planting seeds and watering the crops.
target: Kisan pura din kheti ma mehnat garera bij ropera ra bali lai pani halcha.

source: The festival was filled with music, dancing, and delicious food from different cultures.
target: Festival ma music, naach ra dherai culture ko mitho khana le bharipurna thiyo.

source: The baby smiled brightly when her mother gave her a new toy to play with.
target: Bachha ko aama le naya toy diyo khelna, ani bachha khusi hune.

source: The hikers packed their bags with water, snacks, and gear before starting their journey up the trail.
target: Hiker haru le afno bag ma paani, khaja ra gear haru rakhe ra hike suru gare.

source: The new bakery in town has quickly become famous for its delicious pastries and cakes.
target: Sahar ko naya bakery ekdam chito mitho pastry ra cake ko lagi famous bhaisakyo.

source: The doctor advised the patient to eat healthy food and exercise regularly.
target: Doctor le patient lai healthy khana khana ra daily exercise garna suggest gare.

source: The grandparents love spending time with their grandchildren, telling stories and playing games.
target: Bajai bajai haru afno nati natni sanga ramailo time bitaucha, katha sunera ra games khelera.

source: The artist spent weeks painting a large mural on the wall of the community center.
target: Artist le pura hafta lagayo community center ko bhitta ma thulo mural banuna.

source: The little girl baked cookies for the first time and proudly shared them with her family.
target: Sano keti le pahilo choti biscuit bake gari ani afno family sanga khusi hune share gare.

source: The museum had an exhibit featuring rare artifacts from ancient civilizations.
target: Museum ma purano sabhyata bata rare samaan haru dekhaiyo.

source: We enjoyed the scenic drive along the coast, stopping occasionally to take photos.
target: Hami coast ko ramailo drive enjoy garna, bich bich ma photo lina stop gareu.

source: The children made handmade greeting cards for their teachers on Teacher’s Day.
target: Bachha haru le afno teacher ko lagi handmade greeting card banaye Teacher’s Day ma.

target: Athlete le aune marathon ko lagi har subha training garthyo.

source: The dog wagged its tail excitedly when it saw its owner coming home.
target: Kukkur le afno malik ghar aauda khushi hune dumm hilaune thalyo.

source: We went to the rooftop at night to stargaze and enjoy the cool breeze.
target: Hami rati chhano ma taara herna ra thanda hawa enjoy garna gayo.

source: The little boy eagerly helped his mother bake a cake for his sister's birthday.
target: Sano keta le afno didi ko birthday ko lagi cake banauna mummy lai madad garna ramailo ma thiyo.

source: The local cafe serves the best coffee in town, and it's always packed with customers.
target: Yaha ko local cafe le sab bhanda ramro coffee dincha, ani hamesha bheed lagcha.

source: The children spent the afternoon flying kites in the open field.
target: Bachha haru le khula maidaan ma pura belka changa udaune ramailo gare.

source: The community organized a cleanup drive to make the park more beautiful and usable.
target: Samudaya le park safha garera ramailo banuna cleanup drive organize gare.

source: The new restaurant has a cozy vibe, and their momos are absolutely delicious.
target: Naya restaurant ma ekdam chill atmosphere cha ani momo ta kasto mitho cha ni!

source: We played cards late into the night and laughed at each other's jokes.
target: Hami raat samma taas kheldai, ek arko ko joke ma hasaune time bitayo.

source: The gardener watered the plants early in the morning and trimmed the bushes.
target: Mali le bihaana chhito biruwa ma paani halera jhaadi haru kaatyo.

source: The village elders sat together under the big tree, discussing old times.
target: Gaun ka buda budhi haru thulo rukh muni basera purano kura gariraheka thiye.

source: The city looks magical at night with all the lights and decorations during the festival.
target: Sahar festival ko bela raat ma batti ra sajawat le ekdam sundar dekhcha.

source: The siblings fought over the last piece of chocolate but ended up sharing it.
target: Dai bahini haru last chocolate ko lagi jhagadcha, tara ant ma share gardai khanchan.

source: The bus ride through the winding mountain roads was both thrilling and a little scary.
target: Mountain ko ghumau ghumti bato ma bus ride ekdam ramailo ra ali dar lagdo pani thiyo.

source: The teacher praised the students for their hard work and dedication during the project.
target: Teacher le project ma mehnat ra lagan ko lagi students haru lai taarif garen.

source: The market was bustling with people buying fresh vegetables and fruits early in the morning.
target: Subha subha bajar ma manche haru taja tarkari ra falful kiniraheko bheed thiyo.

source: We spent the evening watching the sunset and talking about our dreams and plans.
target: Hami belka surya ast herera sapana ra plan ko kura garna bitayeu.

source: The adventurous group decided to camp by the river and cook their dinner over a fire.
target: Adventure group le nadi ko kinara camp garera aago ma dinner banune decide gare.

source: The little girl gave her father a big hug when he brought her favorite ice cream.
target: Sano keti le afno baba lai ramailo hug diyo, usko man pareko ice cream lyako ma.

source: The football match between the local teams attracted a large crowd of enthusiastic fans.
target: Local team ko football match ma ramailo fans ko dherai bheed thiyo.

source: The old bridge creaked under the weight of the travelers crossing it one by one.
target: Puraano pul manche haru ek ek kera janu ma awaj nikalcha.

source: The young boy was excited to try his new bicycle and rode it around the neighborhood.
target: Sano keta afno naya cycle try garna excited thiyo, ani mohalla ko chakkar lagayo.

source: The rain started suddenly, and everyone ran to find shelter under the nearest shop's roof.
target: Achanak pani parna thalyo, ani sabai najikai ko pasal ko chhat muni gaera lukcha.

source: The family gathered around the bonfire, roasting marshmallows and sharing funny stories.
target: Family sabai bonfire ko wari jamera marshmallow roast gardai ra ramailo katha suncha.

source: The little puppy followed the kids around the yard, wagging its tail happily.
target: Sano kukur bachha haru ko pachhadi yard ma dumm hilaudai ghumnu lagyo.

source: The market was alive with the sounds of vendors calling out and people bargaining.
target: Bazar ma thela wala haru ko awaaj ra bargain garne manche haru le ramailo lagcha.

source: The adventurous group climbed the tall hill to get a better view of the valley below.
target: Adventure group le tala ko upatyaka dekhna thulo pahad chadhyo.

source: She carefully wrapped the gift in colorful paper and tied it with a shiny ribbon.
target: Usle gift lai ramailo rangichangi kagaz le ramrari pack gari ani chamkile ribbon lagai diyo.

source: The villagers celebrated the harvest festival with dancing, music, and delicious food.
target: Gaunle haru le baliko parva naach, music ra mitho khana sanga manae.

source: The old man sat on the porch, sipping tea and enjoying the gentle breeze.
target: Budo manche baranda ma basera chai sip gardai thado hawa enjoy gardai thiyo.

source: The kids had a blast splashing water and playing games at the pool party.
target: Bachha haru pool party ma paani chhichaldai ra game khelera ekdam ramailo garen.

source: The mother bird carefully fed her chicks and watched them grow day by day.
target: Aama chara le afno bachha haru lai ramrari khana khuwaera din dinai ramailo hercha.

source: The tourists explored the narrow streets of the old town, taking pictures and buying souvenirs.
target: Tourist haru puraano sahar ko saana galli herna gaye, photo khichera ra saman kinera.

source: The boy stayed up late, looking through his telescope to see the stars and planets.
target: Keta raat samma telescope bata taara ra graha herna uthiyo.

source: The festive lights lit up the entire street, making the neighborhood look magical.
target: Festive light le pura galli ujyalo banayo, ani mohalla magical dekhiyo.

source: The curious cat climbed the tree to chase a squirrel but got stuck halfway up.
target: Jigyashu biralo le muso ko pachi pachi rukh chadhyo tara bich ma phaseko.

source: The children dressed up in costumes for the school play and looked adorable on stage.
target: Bachha haru school play ko lagi costume ma sajhi ra stage ma ekdam ramailo dekhiyo.

source: The neighborhood friends gathered for a cricket match on the vacant lot.
target: Mohalla ko saathi haru khali jagga ma cricket match ko lagi jamyo.

source: The little girl proudly showed off her drawing to her parents and grandparents.
target: Sano keti le afno drawing proud sanga mummy, baba ra bajai bajai lai dekhauni.

source: The friends spent the entire day exploring the woods and spotting birds and animals.
target: Saathi haru pura din jungle ma ghumera chara ra janawar herda bitayo.

source: The small cafe near the lake offered a perfect spot to relax and enjoy the view.
target: Pokhari najikai ko sano cafe ma relax garna ra view enjoy garna thik thau thiyo.

source: The dog barked loudly at the mailman, but he quickly ran away when he saw the leash.
target: Kukkur le mailman lai zor le bhokyo, tara leash herera chito bhaagyo.

source: We spent the afternoon at the zoo, watching the animals and taking pictures with the elephants.
target: Hami zoo ma beluka bitayo, janawar haru herda ra haathi sanga photo kheechda.

source: The couple went for a long walk along the beach, holding hands and talking about their future.
target: Jodi le beach ma lamo ghumna gayo, hatma hath ra sapana ko kura garera.

source: The kids had a blast playing tag in the park, running around and laughing together.
target: Bachha haru park ma tag kheldai ek arka sanga daudera ramailo gare.

source: The baker carefully shaped the dough and placed it in the oven to bake the bread.
target: Baker le dough ramrari shape gari, ruti bake garna oven ma rakhe.

source: The couple decorated their house with flowers and candles for their wedding anniversary.
target: Jodi le apno wedding anniversary ko lagi phool ra mombatti sanga ghar sajayo.

source: The kids jumped into the pool from the diving board and made huge splashes.
target: Bachha haru diving board bata pool ma koodera paani chhichali diye.

source: The friends sat by the bonfire, singing songs and playing the guitar.
target: Saathi haru bonfire ko wari basera geet gaudai ra guitar bajaunda ramailo garen.

source: The elderly woman carefully watered the plants and smiled as she watched them grow.
target: Buda mahila le biruwa ma paani halera muskurai ra biruwa haru badhda herera ramailo garen.

source: We went to the mountain top to enjoy the sunrise and took lots of photos.
target: Hami pahar ko shikhar ma suryoday herna gaye ra dherai photo kheechyo.

source: The small restaurant near the corner serves the best momos in town, and the service is great.
target: Konera ko naya restaurant le sabai bhanda ramro momo dincha, ani service pani dami cha.

source: The children enjoyed playing with their toys in the sandbox, building castles and digging tunnels.
target: Bachha haru sandbox ma khelna ra balu ko ghar banauna ma ramailo garen.

source: The farmer harvested the crops in the field, and the family helped bring in the produce.
target: Kisan le kheti bata bali uthayo, ani family le saman ko sahayog gare.

source: The friends decided to go on a road trip across the country and visit all the famous landmarks.
target: Saathi haru le desh bhari road trip garne decide gare ra famous thau haru herne plan gare.

source: The teacher encouraged the students to participate in the school talent show.
target: Teacher le students haru lai school ko talent show ma participate garna encourage gare.

source: The musician played his guitar in the park, drawing a crowd of people who enjoyed his music.
target: Musician le park ma guitar bajayo, ani dherai manche haru usko music herne aayo.

source: We spent the weekend hiking through the forest, spotting birds and taking breaks by the river.
target: Hami weekend ma jungle ko bich ghumera, chara haru herera ra nadi ko kinara break garera bitayo.

source: The children painted colorful pictures of animals and displayed them in the classroom.
target: Bachha haru le rangichangi janawar ko photo paint gare ra classroom ma rakhe.

source: The old man sat on the rocking chair, reading a book and sipping tea.
target: Buda manche rocking chair ma basera kitab padhiraheko thiyo ani chai sip gardai.

source: We had a great time at the amusement park, riding roller coasters and eating cotton candy.
target: Hami amusement park ma roller coaster ma ride garera ra cotton candy khayera ramailo garen.
